snippet: Bruno Iksil, the JPMorgan Chase trader who is effectively betting that the creditworthiness of a group of companies will improve, may be protected under the new regulation.
abstract: Bruno Iksil, the JPMorgan Chase trader who is effectively betting that the creditworthiness of a group of companies will improve, may be protected under the new regulation.

headline.main: What Volcker Rule Could Mean for JPMorgan's Big Trades
